DownfallExtension:MindBloom.NAME: Mind Bloom
DESCRIPTIONS: While walking and traversing through the beauty of the Beyond, your thoughts suddenly begin to feel very... #p~real...~ NL NL Imaginings of #rslain #radventurers and #bhoarded #bsouls begin to manifest themselves into reality. NL The sensation is quickly fleeting. What do you do?
You know you have been here before. NL NL Hunting the same adventurer. NL NL Is any of this real? NL NL How many times have you been slain?
Everything makes sense now. NL The singular purpose, the descent, the #pHeart. NL NL This is the way it always was. NL This is the way it always will be. NL All will be forgotten again soon...
